features.body: Use advanced technology to transform raw data into explanatory variables
Select a prediction problem with a click and FeauteLab does the rest
Use your domain expertise to tune models for your business needs
Take advantage of all of your data and achieve superior results
Connect to existing databases and upload spreadsheets or text files
Automatically create models that are as accurate as human-created models
Simulate new inputs and determine how different actions will affect future outcomes
Upload unlabeled data and download batch predictions.
Run FeatureLab in a secure cloud
Software that is built to be enjoyable to use
